it.polimi.se2018.server.network.rmi

Class VirtualRmi

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • it.polimi.se2018.server.network.VirtualView
        • it.polimi.se2018.server.network.rmi.VirtualRmi
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class VirtualRmi
extends VirtualView
    Class VirtualSocket: the class is a subclass of the Virtual View, so it implements the same features, but it's responsible to effectively manage the communication with the rmi technology. The class runs a timeout timer for the rmi client disconnection, it's responsible to send the event of the remote client method call directly to the controller and of calling the remote method on the skeleton of the client
    Author:
    fadda-miceli-mundo
    See Also:
    VirtualView

      • Fields inherited from class it.polimi.se2018.server.network.VirtualView

        model, name, playerID

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VirtualRmi(RmiClientInterface clientRmi, Server server, int id)
      Class constructor for a new Virtual rmi associated with a unique id, that runs on the Server and associated with the rmi client interfare to call the remote method, it also load from a settings file the timeout of the rmi player for the disconnection

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void disconnectionRmi()
      method responsible of handling the rmi disconnection of the client, both the case of the disconnection before the game started and the disconnection during the game
      private boolean isRunning()
      method that provide the caller of the current state of the virtual rmi
      void sendEvent(Event event)
      Override of the method of the superclass, the method is responsible of calling the remote method responsible of the event obtained as parameter
      (package private) void sendEventController(Event event)
      method used to send the notification to the controller of the user input (Observable)
      (package private) void timeout()
      method that runs a new timer for waiting TIMEKEEPER seconds, after that the rmi client is considered disconnected if no ping arrives
      void update(java.util.Observable o, java.lang.Object arg)
      Override of the built-in method of the Observer class, it's called after a notify of the model, so that the virtual rmi can update after a modification of the model and call the remote method on the client (Observer)

        getModel, getName, getPlayerID, setModel, setName, setPlayerID
